name: VR Darts (itch) (mulitasoft)
description:
This is an experiment in making something for VR.

There's not points awarded for hitting the dardboard, you can throw the darts anywhere.

The button in the virtual table will delete all the current darts and create a new set in the table.

Tested on Oculus browser. 

NOTE: If you don't see the VR button on the bottom right, resize the browser window!! I'll fix that later.

Credits

Created by Luis Parravicini, the assets I've used are:

  • chair and table are part of the basic wooden furniture pack: CC-BY-1.0 by loafbrr
  • arrow_swoosh.ogg: CC-By-3.0 by smcameron
  • Crossbow/Bow & Arrow » Arrow Impact 2: CC0 by ali_6868
  • Pub ambience: CC-BY-3.0 Yap Audio Production
  • Music: CC-By-4.0 Smooth Lovin by Incompetech
